title: The Wounded
description: The Telling by Eden Winters meets 500 Miles by Parker Williams – a story of four men caught up in the aftermath of war. War has left both Jase and Michael with scars, physical and mental. At times all they’ve suffered weighs heavily, and it’s easy to feel that no one understands what they’ve been through. It’s up to Jay and Mark to show them they’re not alone. And for one of the couples, Veteran’s Day will bring a new beginning…
author: Eden Winters
